Investors are always on the lookout for the next big opportunity. Recently, a noticeable shift has occurred as Internet Computer (ICP) investors are increasingly turning their attention to Mpeppe (MPEPE), a meme coin that promises better returns and a unique approach to digital assets. This shift is fueled by Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s ability to leverage the viral nature of internet memes, combined with its potential to attract a diverse and engaged audience. Here’s why Internet Computer (ICP) investors are now holding Mpeppe (MPEPE) tokens and what this means for both projects.
 
Internet Computer (ICP): A Revolutionary Blockchain, But Investors Seek More 
Internet Computer (ICP) has made significant strides in the blockchain space, offering a decentralized platform that allows developers to creat…
articles.title: Internet Computer (ICP) Investors Now Hold Mpeppe (MPEPE) Tokens As They Provide Better Returns

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Recently, large holders of Internet Computer (ICP), commonly referred to as whales, have made significant moves to diversify their portfolios by purchasing two standout tokens: Mpeppe (MPEPE) and Render (RENDER). These investments reflect a growing interest in projects that combine innovative technology with strong community engagement. Here’s why Internet Computer (ICP) whales are adding Mpeppe (MPEPE) and Render (RENDER) to their portfolios and what it could mean for the future of these cryptos.
 
Internet Computer (ICP) Whales Seek New Growth Opportunities 
Internet Computer (ICP) has long been recognized as a groundbreaking project in the blockchain space, aiming to redefine the internet by providing a decentralized platform for running applications at web speed. As Internet Computer (…
articles.title: Internet Computer Whale Purchase Render (RENDER) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) To Build Out Their Portfolio

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Investors are always on the lookout for new opportunities that promise substantial returns. Recently, a significant trend has emerged among Base Dawgz (DAWGZ) holders as they seek out the potential rewards offered by a new gambling ICO, Mpeppe (MPEPE). This move is driven by Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s innovative approach to blending financial opportunities with community-building and sports fandom. Here’s why Base Dawgz (DAWGZ) holders are finding profitable comfort in Mpeppe (MPEPE) and what it means for the future of both tokens.
 
Base Dawgz (DAWGZ): From Meme Coin Success to New Challenges 
Base Dawgz (DAWGZ) has built a strong reputation within the meme coin community, particularly on the Base blockchain, a Layer-2 solution developed by Coinbase. The project’s Shiba Inu mascot with a “Top Gun” …
articles.title: Base Dawgz (DAWGZ) Holders Find Profitable Comfort In New Gambling ICO Mpeppe (MPEPE)

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) saw inflows of $202.51 million on Monday, marking the eighth consecutive day of gains. In contrast, spot ethereum ETFs experienced a loss of $13.23 million during the same trading session. Bitcoin ETFs Enjoy 8th Straight Day of Inflows With $202M Boost On Aug. 26, the 12 spot bitcoin ETFs […]
articles.title: US Bitcoin ETFs Surge by $202M While Ethereum ETFs Bleed $13M in Outflows

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: French prosecutors have announced that an investigative judge extended the police custody of Pavel Durov, CEO of Telegram, on Monday evening for up to 48 hours. After that, French authorities must either release or charge him. Durov was detained on Saturday at Le Bourget airport amid a judicial investigation launched last month concerning 12 alleged […]
articles.title: French Court Extends Telegram CEO Pavel Durov’s Police Custody

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
In a charged statement on X, Justin Bons, founder and Chief Investment Officer of Cyber Capital, one of Europe’s oldest cryptocurrency funds, has voiced a critical view of Ethereum’s current trajectory, asserting that “Ethereum is dying while L2’s dance on its grave.” Bons argues that Ethereum (ETH) is struggling to maintain its fee revenue due to inadequate network capacity, while Layer 2 (L2) solutions are capitalizing on this limitation by keeping Ethereum’s capacity constrained.
 
Bons claims, “ETH cannot sustain high fee revenue because it lacks the capacity. At the same time, L2s are seeing record highs in usage & fees while they lobby to keep ETH’s capacity down!” He characterizes this dynamic as parasitic, where L2s benefit at Ethereum’s expense, particularly post the EIP-4844 (Pro…
articles.title: Ethereum ‘Is Dying While L2’s Dance On Its Grave’, Claims Investment Firm CEO

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: The Bank of Russia is exploring the use of stablecoins in cross-border transactions, considering them as digital financial assets (DFAs) under existing regulations if they have a responsible entity. articles.title: Bank of Russia Eyes Stablecoins for Cross-Border Transactions
